pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.grid

Classes

Grid

Gird Drawing grid in rectangular coordinate. In a single grid,

Module Contents

class pyecharts.charts.composite_charts.grid.Grid(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())[source]

Bases: pyecharts.charts.chart.Base

Gird Drawing grid in rectangular coordinate. In a single grid, at most two X and Y axes each is allowed. Line chart, bar chart, and scatter chart (bubble chart) can be drawn in grid.
